title: Global Streetscapes (H3)
description: Contains the ID of the h3-indexed hexagon associated with each image, at all available resolution levels from level 0 to 15.
creator: Yujun Hou
Matias Quintana
Maxim Khomiakov
Winston Yap
Jiani Ouyang
Koichi Ito
Zeyu Wang
Tianhong Zhao
Filip Biljecki
publisher: National University of Singapore Urban Analytics Lab
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
data_variables: Unique image ID, Source (Mapillary or KartaView), Orginal ID (by Mapillary or KartaView), Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 0, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 1, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 2, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 3, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 4, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 5, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 6, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 7, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 8, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 9, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 10, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 11, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 12, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 13, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 14, Unique index of the hexagonal cell containing the location of the image at level 15
